Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way/Hafnia Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Golden Dolphin Way and Hafnia Way.
Room.LongDescription: hafnia Way is a short road which connects Golden Dolphin Way and Nagaritha Drive to the north. Hafnia Way passes between the Golden Dolphin Inn on the west and a great caravan embarkment area on the east. Oceancrest supplies many of the surrounding cities with grain and products made by the craftsmen in the city. Caravans are put together here, and depart when enough travelers feel safe to venture into the outside world.
